title: About ZhenGrowth
hero: Meet Amelda Chen — Founder of ZhenGrowth
tag: Certified Life Mastery Consultant • Coach • Mentor • RTT Therapist • Speaker
intro_p1: I'm Amelda — a Life Mastery Consultant certified by the Brave Thinking Institute. I help purpose-driven women clarify what they truly want, dissolve the inner blocks that keep them stuck, and design lives they absolutely love.
intro_p2: As a coach, mentor, RTT therapist, and speaker, my work blends proven transformation principles with compassionate accountability so you move from insight to action with confidence and consistency.
bio_p1: I'm also a single mom and entrepreneur. My three children inspire me to go further and to live by the belief that life happens for us, not to us.
bio_p2: Over the years I've studied and implemented transformational success principles and have become a sought-after trainer and speaker.
cred: Credentials: Life Mastery Consultant (Brave Thinking Institute), John Maxwell leadership coach, RTT Therapist (Marisa Peer), ICF-certified coach.
life: Beyond coaching, I'm a world traveler, PADI Advanced Open Water diver, and a designer with an appreciation for natural living. My faith as a follower of Jesus anchors me in the conviction that love never fails.
mission: Our mission at ZhenGrowth is simple: help millions of women build their dreams, accelerate results, and lead richer, more fulfilling lives — with clarity, confidence, and purpose.
cta: Ready for your next level? Book a free discovery call.
